intro.paragraph1: ITempile ye-Orbital yisathelayithi enomsebenzi wobugcisa: isikhumbuzo esisemajukujukwini esivuleleke kuye wonke umntu onesivakalisi ohlala okanye okhe wahlala eMhlabeni.
intro.paragraph2: Ngeendlela zobuchwepheshe, nabani na angathumela igama lomntu endlwini kaThixo, nokuba ngowafayo, umntu ophilayo kakhulu, okanye nawuphi na umntu ofanele ukukhunjulwa.

sculpture.heading: Umfanekiso oqingqiweyo
sculpture.paragraph1: Umsebenzi wobugcisa unezinto ezintathu ezixhomekeke kuzo: isathelayithi eyilelwe ngokukhethekileyo ukugcina iibhiliyoni zamagama; umfanekiso oqingqiweyo kawonke-wonke otshintshisa ngesathelayithi; kunye newebhusayithi apho abathathi-nxaxheba bathumela amagama, ukususela ngoku kude kube bayadlula, ezulwini.
sculpture.paragraph2: Njengomzamo wezinto ezininzi, iTempile ye-Orbital inokuthathwa njengomfanekiso oqingqiweyo wesayithi, indawo yokuhlala. Ikwayiprojekthi ye-Artat.

antenna.heading: I-Antenna njengoMfanekiso kawonke-wonke
antenna.paragraph2: I-eriyali eya kuba kunxibelelwano oluthe ngqo kunye nesathelayithi ye-orbital iyayilwa.
antenna.paragraph3: Ngomphezulu okhanyayo wegolide, obonisa isibhakabhaka ngaphezulu kwawo, sisiqalo sokuvuselela ubunzima (okanye ubudlelwane bethu kwinto 'ephezulu phaya').
antenna.paragraph4: Ngelixa imifanekiso eqingqiweyo ingafakwanga kwiindawo ezininzi zehlabathi, iiFrames zethu ezisuka eMhlabeni, ezilawula isathelayithi ngoku, zithumela amagama kwindawo nganye yokudlula.
antenna.paragraph5: Nceda uzise lo mbono kwisixeko sakho-ukufaka imifanekiso eqingqiweyo ye-eriyali ekhuthaza iincoko malunga nokuphononongwa kwendawo, ubugcisa, kunye nendawo yethu ekwabelwana ngayo kwi-cosmos. Funda ngakumbi malunga nokuxhasa iprojekthi .

imageCaptions.riseNy: Itempile ye-Orbital esithubeni. Unikezelo lwe3D yiRiseNY&Partners.
